@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX May 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)

nodes.bodyText: :func:`substring`
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX May 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:``substring`` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)

nodes.bodyText: about the roles granted to principals

@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX May 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)

@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX May 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:``substring`` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about what roles where granted to what principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Adding schema access rules to file based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix a bug that caused missing column statistics after ``INSERT`` to new table. (:issue:`2469`)

nodes.bodyText: Support caching with secured coordinator.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX May 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:``substring`` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about what roles where granted to what principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Adding schema access rules to file based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix a bug that caused missing column statistics after ``INSERT`` to new table. (:issue:`2469`)
+* Add support for ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table when ``hive.security=sql-standard``.  (:issue:`3535`)
+* Allow non-lowercase column names in ``system.sync_partition_metadata`` procedure. This can be enabled
+  by passing ``case_sensitive=false`` when invoking the procedure. (:issue:`3431`)
+* Make caching work when coordinator is secured. (:issue:`3874`)

@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX May 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:``substring`` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about what roles where granted to what principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Adding schema access rules to file based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix a bug that caused missing column statistics after ``INSERT`` to new table. (:issue:`2469`)
+* Add support for ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table when ``hive.security=sql-standard``.  (:issue:`3535`)
+* Allow non-lowercase column names in ``system.sync_partition_metadata`` procedure. This can be enabled
+  by passing ``case_sensitive=false`` when invoking the procedure. (:issue:`3431`)
+* Make caching work when coordinator is secured. (:issue:`3874`)
+* Prevent caching from turning off in case of intermittent network failures. (:issue:`3874`)
+* Make caching and HDFS impersonation mutually exclusive. (:issue:`3913`)

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,42 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX May 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:``substring`` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about what roles where granted to what principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Adding schema access rules to file based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix a bug that caused missing column statistics after ``INSERT`` to new table. (:issue:`2469`)
+* Add support for ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table when ``hive.security=sql-standard``.  (:issue:`3535`)
+* Allow non-lowercase column names in ``system.sync_partition_metadata`` procedure. This can be enabled
+  by passing ``case_sensitive=false`` when invoking the procedure. (:issue:`3431`)
+* Make caching work when coordinator is secured. (:issue:`3874`)
+* Prevent caching from turning off in case of intermittent network failures. (:issue:`3874`)
+* Make caching and HDFS impersonation mutually exclusive. (:issue:`3913`)
+* Add ``hive.cache.ttl`` and ``hive.cache.disk-usage-percentage`` cache properties. (:issue:`3840`)
+* Schedule work on nodes with cached data. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for ``UNIONTYPE``.  This is mapped to ``ROW`` containing a ``tag`` field and a field for each data type in the union. For
+  example, ``UNIONTYPE<INT, DOUBLE>`` is mapped to ``ROW(tag INTEGER, field0 INTEGER, field1 DOUBLE)``. (:issue:`3483`)
+* Make ``partition_values`` argument to ``drop_stats`` procedure optional. (:issue:`3937`)
+* Improve performance of complex queries over partitioned data. (:issue:`1072`)
+
+Phoenix Connector Changes
+-------------------------
+
+* Allow configuring whether ``DROP TABLE`` is allowed. This is controlled by the new ``allow-drop-table``

@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)

nodes.bodyText:
Worth mentioning "dynamic filtering" here since it's something users already understand.
Otherwise this bullet is easy to overlook, while it is very important.
Also, we could add some numbers (eg "by x % on certain TPC-DS queries").

nodes.bodyText:
converting ... TIMESTAMP into TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE

I don't understand what this is saying, since they are the same type. The optional WITHOUT TIME ZONE part is syntactic "noise words" (as the PostgreSQL documentation would say) and we don't ever document or display that. Users know it as the TIMESTAMP type.

nodes.bodyText: Move this above with the fixes, since this is a fix/change to existing behavior.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)

nodes.bodyText: Move this above to general changes. It's not specifically a security feature.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:`substring` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about the roles granted to principals. (:issue:`3535`)

nodes.bodyText:
"fix a bug" should be avoided. How about

Collect column statistics for inserts into empty tables.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:`substring` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about the roles granted to principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Add schema access rules to file-based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix a bug that caused missing column statistics after ``INSERT`` into a new table. (:issue:`2469`)

+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:`substring` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)

+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about the roles granted to principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Add schema access rules to file-based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)

+Hive Connector Changes

nodes.bodyText: "secured" isn't very specific. Does this mean when HTTPS is required and when authentication is enabled?
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:`substring` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about the roles granted to principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Add schema access rules to file-based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix a bug that caused missing column statistics after ``INSERT`` into a new table. (:issue:`2469`)
+* Add support for ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table when ``hive.security=sql-standard``.  (:issue:`3535`)
+* Allow non-lowercase column names in ``system.sync_partition_metadata`` procedure. This can be enabled
+  by passing ``case_sensitive=false`` when invoking the procedure. (:issue:`3431`)
+* Support caching with secured coordinator. (:issue:`3874`)

nodes.bodyText: Prevent caching from becoming disabled due to intermittent network failures.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,51 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP WITHOUT TIME ZONE`` type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`)
+* Add a variant of :func:`substring` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about the roles granted to principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+* Add schema access rules to file-based system access control. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+Hive Connector Changes
+----------------------
+
+* Fix a bug that caused missing column statistics after ``INSERT`` into a new table. (:issue:`2469`)
+* Add support for ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table when ``hive.security=sql-standard``.  (:issue:`3535`)
+* Allow non-lowercase column names in ``system.sync_partition_metadata`` procedure. This can be enabled
+  by passing ``case_sensitive=false`` when invoking the procedure. (:issue:`3431`)
+* Support caching with secured coordinator. (:issue:`3874`)
+* Prevent caching from turning off in case of intermittent network failures. (:issue:`3874`)

nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -0,0 +1,70 @@
+=========================
+Release 335 (XX Jun 2020)
+=========================
+
+General Changes
+---------------
+
+* Fix failure when :func:`reduce_agg` is used as a window function. (:issue:`3883`)
+* Fix incorrect cast from ``TIMESTAMP`` (without time zone) to ``TIME`` type. (:issue:`3848`)
+* Fix incorrect query results when converting very large ``TIMESTAMP`` values into
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE``, or when parsing very large
+  ``TIMESTAMP WITH TIME ZONE`` values. (:issue:`3956`)
+* Return ``VARCHAR`` type when :func:`substr` argument is ``CHAR`` type. (:issue:`3599`, :issue:`3456`)
+* Improve optimized local scheduling with regard to non-uniform data distribution. (:issue:`3922`)
+* Add support for variable-precision ``TIMESTAMP`` (without time zone) type. (:issue:`3783`)
+* Add a variant of :func:`substring` that takes a ``CHAR`` argument. (:issue:`3949`)
+* Add  ``information_schema.role_authorization_descriptors`` table that returns information about the roles
+  granted to principals. (:issue:`3535`)
+
+Security Changes
+----------------
+
+* Add schema access rules to :ref:`file-based-system-access-control`. (:issue:`3766`)
+
+JDBC Driver
+-----------
+
+* Fix the value returned from ``ResultSet.getDate`` for dates before October 4th, 1582. (:issue:`4005`)
+* Fix the value returned from ``ResultSet.getTimestamp`` for dates before October 4th, 1582. (:issue:`4005`)
+
